about_the_game: This is a fantasy action roguelike game where you can choose a faction from different races such as Alliance, Orc, Undead, and Demon. You must gather your heroes and army to rush into the battlefield, conquer territories, defeat opponents, and eventually become the ruler of the land. It is a fast-paced and exciting third-person magical action game that provides you with a massive battle experience. The current trial version includes a playable human hero and their troops. Players can lead soldiers and fight against undead, demons, and orcs using a limited amount of supplies. The trial version will gradually update with more content
